plays.text: Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Roughing Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Roughing Michal Handzus
Goal scored by Jamie Pushor assisted by Martin Straka and Dan Focht
Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Straka
Penalty to Eric Meloche 2 minutes for Interference Eric Desjardins
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Surovy
Penalty to Dan Focht 2 minutes for Hooking Tony Amonte
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Crosschecking Keith Primeau
Penalty to Mark Recchi 2 minutes for Crosschecking Rico Fata
Goal scored by Michal Handzus assisted by John LeClair and Eric Weinrich
Penalty to Richard Lintner 2 minutes for Hooking Kim Johnsson
Goal scored by Keith Primeau assisted by Kim Johnsson and Tony Amonte
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 2 minutes for Elbowing Tomas Surovy
Goal scored by Sami Kapanen assisted by Keith Primeau
Penalty to Jeremy Roenick 2 minutes for High Sticking Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Radovan Somik assisted by Keith Primeau
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Claude Lapointe 2 minutes for Boarding Eric Meloche
Goal scored by Marty Murray assisted by Chris Therien and Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Eric Desjardins and Mark Recchi
